name: Cute Anime Girls: Asuka ZERO
description:
Beloved in Japan with over 2 million downloads, Sengoku Asuka ZERO is finally available in English, German, and French!

Over 100+ memorable characters!

Build a bustling town of fully voiced and fully adorable warriors and build your relationship with them! Create your own formidable army of ninjas and samurai from Japanese history, all re-imagined with anime visuals!

Battle through an epic story and unleash devastating EX skills on your enemies!

Fight your friends in PvP or join them in co-operative Raid battles!

-STORY-

In the Sengoku period of Japan, the powerful yet mysterious Kokujō clan emerge from the chaos of battle.

In the flash of a drawn blade, their Dark Generals embark on a campaign of complete domination over western Japan.

The willful Sakihime returns home to her castle of Aoba from distant travels, only to discover it has been laid to waste by the Kokujō.

Supporting the young Sakihime as her regent, you prepare to take back the country from the encroaching darkness and restore balance to the war-torn lands of Japan!

Recommended for people who like:
- Cosplay and dating sim games
- To flirt and kiss cute anime girls
- Waifu, samurai, and ninjas
- Free RPG, romance games, and love stories
- Japanese anime, manga, novels, movies, culture, or history
- A voice actress for every cute anime girl
